title: His Indecent Lessons
description: Cheyenne Grear was looking forward to college. High school boys were lame and immature. College would provide a smorgasbord of sexy educated men who would be dying to vie for her attention. At least, that's what she hoped. What actually happened was far from her imagined reality.She never expected to fall for someone much older and totally inaccessible.Damien Reed is confident, sexy, and everything a man should be. The only problem is, he doesn't even seem to know that Cheyenne exists.When an attempt at thievery goes bad, Cheyenne ends up face to face with the man of her dreams, but is there more to him than meets the eye?Approximate 13,200+ words or 45 pages. A novelette.Content This story contains lots of steamy bits too explicit for this blurb. For readers 18+ only!Themes in this College, New Adult, Love Triangles, and Multiple Partners.This is part 1 of a 4 part series. author: Sky Corgan
